issue.title: [CF 427] Prefab buff/debuff list updates
issue.body:
I have just a few updates/changes for some of the prefab lists. I hope this helps!

ImmuneToStun
  -The Beast Within (no player stun immunity as of 3.3)
  -Dispersion (only immune to movement impairing effects)
  +Free Action (seems like a good one to add)

ImmuneToMagicCC
-The Beast Within (same as above)
+Anti Magic Shell (prevents magic cc from landing at all)
-Dispersion (same as above)

DamageBuffs
  +Tricks of the Trade(id 57933) (+10/15% dmg for 6s)
  +Elemental Mastery (ele sham 3m CD)
  +Ancient Power (ret paladin guardian)

DefensiveBuffs
+Cloak of Shadows (can provide 40% phys dmg reduction glyphed)
+Army of the Dead (provides dmg reduction = to dodge+parry)
+Ancient Guardian (prot paaladin guardian)


> Posted by CurseForge user kaustos | Imported from CurseForge issue #427 | Raw

comments.body:
Should have got them all in, but TMW is a mess right now because I am in the middle of a massive overhaul of conditions. You might not see these changes for a week or so.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
